{"tiddlers":{"$:/pluginlibrary/ajh/released":{"text":"The plugin library for the latest and greatest plugins from [ext[t5a|https://github.com/t5a/t5a.github.io.git]]; most recent released versions of plugins by [ext[Andrew|http://t5a.github.io/#Andrew%20Harrison]].","url":"https://t5a.github.io/plugins","title":"$:/pluginlibrary/ajh/released","tags":"$:/tags/PluginLibrary","caption":"Tiddlywiki Library for Plugins by Andrew Harrison"},"$:/plugins/ajh/throbclock/icon":{"text":"","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/throbclock/icon","tags":"$:/tags/Image"},"$:/plugins/ajh/throbclock/license":{"text":"Throb Clock Copyright (c) 2019-<> Andrew Harrison [[BSD 3-Clause License|https://raw.githubusercontent.com/t5a/t5a.github.io/master/LICENSE]]","url":"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/t5a/t5a.github.io/master/LICENSE","type":"","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/throbclock/license","tags":"$:/tags/License","license-type":"BSD 3-Clause License"},"$:/plugins/ajh/throbclock/readme":{"text":"This plugin provides an analog clock with orbiting circles to tell the time. It uses SVG animateTranform elements to move. This plugin comprises: * Stylesheet * Template","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/throbclock/readme","tags":""},"$:/plugins/ajh/throbclock/stylesheet":{"text":".tc-throb {fill:transparent;position:relative;stroke-width:7;}.tc-throb-cir {stroke-width:5;stroke:#000;stroke-dasharray:1 25.8;transform:rotate(-0.5deg);transform-origin:center;}.tc-throb-s {stroke:url(#throb-s);stroke-dasharray:263;stroke-dashoffset:{{!!adjust-seconds}};}.tc-throb-m {stroke:url(#throb-m);stroke-dasharray:213;stroke-dashoffset:{{!!adjust-minutes}};}.tc-throb-h {stroke:url(#throb-h);stroke-dasharray:163;stroke-dashoffset:{{!!adjust-hours}};}.tc-badge-throb {fill:#ff0;stroke:#c0f;stroke-width:2;}.tc-icon-throb {height:24pt;width:24pt;}","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/throbclock/stylesheet","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","seconds-tail-color":"#d00","seconds-head-color":"#f00","seconds-body-color":"#e00","minutes-tail-color":"#1c6","minutes-head-color":"#3c6","minutes-body-color":"#2c6","hours-tail-color":"#10f","hours-head-color":"#30f","hours-body-color":"#20f","defs":"","caption":"Throb Clock","adjust-seconds":"-9","adjust-minutes":"2","adjust-hours":"12"},"$:/plugins/ajh/throbclock/template":{"text":"\define a() <$vars s1=<>m5=<>h5=<>><$vars s={{{ [multiply[6]] }}}m3={{{ [multiply[6]] }}}m4={{{ [divide[10]] }}}h3={{{ [
multiply[30]] }}}h4={{{ [divide[2]] }}}><$vars m={{{ [add] }}}h={{{ [

add

] }}}><$vars s2={{{ [add[360]] }}}m2={{{ [add[360]] }}}h2={{{ [add[360]] }}}><>","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/throbclock/template","tags":""}}}
title: $:/plugins/ajh/throbclock
